channel.title: Dyce It All, Trusted and Legit
channel.description:
[center][img]http://img3.imageshack.us/img3/4090/11662593.png[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2czyfyg.png[/img][/center] [hr] Tried of getting scammed while dicing?, Well not anymore with the MSCP trusted dice clan "Dyce it all" located on W3 in front of Juliets house., Ran by MSCPers just like you! Founded by "Krackkid" and "ILikeArrays", The buzz of Dyce It All has been spreading fast, Various members of these forums have tried it and made some cash, Others how ever lost some D:! How does dicing work? Well its very simple. [hr] Step one, You need a dice bag as shown below. [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/11h9e1e.png[/img] Step Two, You select the "2 six sided dice" option. Step Three, Find your self a host, They are ranked in "Dyce It all" friend chat, People like my self. Step Four, Trade the host the amount you wish to bet, Then he will look for a match, By saying "+Amount+ Wager @ +HostName+" Step Five, After the host finds a match he will say "+Player1+ vs +Player2+, +Betamount+ roll em!" Step Six, Then both you and the other player will roll, Using the "friends roll" option, whoever rolls higher wins! The host keeps 10% as a handling fee. Step Seven, After winning you can go spend your cash :D Or dice again. [hr] Simple converison to see how much you win. [center]50k == 90k(After 10% is removed) 100k == 190k(After 10% is removed) 500k == 900k(After 10% is removed) 1m == 1.9m(After 10% is removed) and so forth.[/center] [hr] Some names of people from mscp who host. Krackkid ILikeArrays Taharok Drub ~*icestorm*~ gravenfire23 reyx7(Part time host) So you can pick your favourite and have them host for you!, Just send them a pm on here! [hr]
Thanks for reading :D! Any question or comments feel free to post. For videos check out our youtube channel look in my sig.

item.title: Dyce It All, Trusted and Legit
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

[quote=“whattehp406, post:260, topic:411486”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=512742.msg3763299#msg3763299 date=1317038142]

So how do you get dices?

You obtain dices through an NPC located in Al Kharid, I believe.
[/quote]Ah yeah, the guy who sells toys and stuff.[/quote]
Aka Faruq.

Read full topic

[/quote]

your clearly an idiot sigs can lie very easily[/quote]

[quote=“eballer48, post:248, topic:411486”][quote author=judostar1 link=topic=512742.msg3759331#msg3759331 date=1316743095]

No more host, Even rey is just a host for the night.

Why cant u be repped?

Because you were repping him for no reason, which violates the Rep abuse rule, which he didn’t break. However, your misdemeanor has prevented you from repping for a short period of time.

this ^
[/quote]

K thnx rey.

Stfu judo your a little Bitch and can’t do anything but talk shit.[/quote]
